mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (member_code, member_name, id, password, email, phone, address, isMember) values (nextmemcode(), #{memberName}, #{id}, password(#{password}), #{email}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{isMember});
mapper.select: select * from tbl_member where id = #{userid} and password = password(#{userpw})
